title: Sepp Kuss Clinches GC Win at Burgos, ‘Recharged’ Vingegaard Returns to Basque Country after Crash
content:
Kuss carries momentum into his title defense at the Vuelta a España, with Visma teammate Vingegaard back in action this weekend.

Read the full article at Sepp Kuss Clinches GC Win at Burgos, ‘Recharged’ Vingegaard Returns to Basque Country after Crash on Velo.
author: ahood
